meaning: Green is the color of nature. It symbolizes growth, harmony, freshness, and fertility.</br></br>Green has strong emotional correspondence with safety.</br></br>Dark green is also commonly associated with money.</br></br>Green has great healing power. It is the most restful color for human eyes; it can improve vision.</br></br>Green suggests stability and endurance.</br></br>Sometimes green denotes lack of experience; for example, a 'greenhorn' is a novice.</br></br>In heraldry, green indicates growth and hope.</br></br>Green, as opposed to red, means safety; it is the color of free passage in road traffic.</br></br>Use green to indicate safety when advertising drugs and medical products.</br></br> Green is directly related to nature, so you can use it to promote 'green' products.</br></br> Dull, darker green is commonly associated with money, financial world, banking, and Wall Street.</br></br>Dark green is associated with ambition, greed, and jealousy.</br></br>Yellow-green can indicate sickness, cowardice, discord, and jealousy.</br></br>Aqua is associated with emotional healing and protection.</br></br>Olive green is the traditional color of peace.
